page.title: 07LEISURE AND RECREATION.
page.content:
Mewsbrook Park - Littlehampton.
This beautiful park near to the sea is between Rustington and Littleham- pton.It has a large lake with an island,many flower beds and a fenced playground.The lake attracts many birds,including swans and ducks,and is used in the summer for boating. A playground has swings, slides, roundabouts, a climbing frame and a see-saw. Also grassed areas are used for putting and other games. It is a pleasant place for a quiet walk and a peaceful seat beside the lake. It's many colourful flowerbeds are looked after by the Arun District Council gardeners. The park has a snack bar and a miniature railway which are operated during the summer, and enjoyed by visitors.
